l I call for a rematch
alright, i will take you up on that. where shall we settle this? Gilly?
Not Gilly... Tyrene Territory. Eve is fine.

yeah, its a hit an mis kinda thing- my destoryers are only 290 parts.

oh and BTW the starboard half of Prince Henry survived, and is still powered...

EDIT: just put two tiny missiles on Drekavak, raised it to 34 tons... ah well... now it's very effective...

so anyone want to battle Zokesia? we can do another small fight (like 2 fighters and a cruser)

I'd rather fill some holes in KIDA's fleet first. We don't have any ships between 50 tons and 180 which is a huge gap!
yes it is... it have three ships in that hole..
Well i would like to join but, where can i get a ship?
Since when is it okay to ram?
as long as it's unmanned, i think the rules say.
though I refer to that as a missile :L

Since when is it okay to ram?

A lot of people frown on it. Im fine with it as long as the ship is designed to ram, so you're confident the pilot will survive. If the pilot dies I think it's a bit of a faux pas.

I guess confirm with your opponent before battle whether ramming is ok.
yeah thats why i broke off the battle. My fighters were designed to ram but they kept getting destroyed in the process. it didn't feel right.

alright, i will take you up on that. where shall we settle this? Gilly?

Gilly:)what crafts?

Two fighters one Light Cruiser/frigate, just like before

Ill defend this time.

EDIT: Im gonna use two 35 ton Fighters and one 85 ton Frigate, for your refrence.
What planets are owned by what companies?

Zokesia Empire owns Duna and Ike

Tyrene Empire/KIDA/Voyager Labs owns Eve and Gilly and Dres

EDIT: Spartwo Tyrene doesnt want us at gilly, what about ike?

You get in place first I'm gonna use four 11 ton fighters and one 60 ton frigate.I claim Minmus(It's my most favoritist).

Somewhere with low gravity.EDIT :Ike should do;)

Edited August 7, 2013 by Spartwo

Zokesia Empire owns Duna and Ike

Tyrene Empire/KIDA/Voyager Labs owns Eve and Gilly and Dres

EDIT: Spartwo Tyrene doesnt want us at gilly, what about ike?

This is correct.

Also I think Kerbin System should be neutral as it's too close to launch sites, Anyone agree?
ok ill get my stuff in place around Ike.

that's because the front plate is removable, to facilitate launch of two heavy missiles and two medium missiles. If it does get hit i can just jetteson it.
Parts on the same craft dont collide
